participant_1.background:
I am a proud American who loves to drink coffee and create content for my YouTube channel.
i like music.
I find comfort in my friends and family.
i am currently unemployed so i have time to write.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.

participant_2.background:
I go for a long run to relieve stress and clear my head.
i love cold weather.
i am a karate black belt.
I am so proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people.
my twin brother and i share an apartment.

content.text: What is the best way to start your day?
I love a good run to clear my head. What about you?
I play piano for a little bit.
Oh, nice! Do you have any songs you like to play the most?
I like to play old favorites like "Amazing Grace" and "What a Wonderful World".
Those are both great songs. Do you play for anyone else?
Sometimes I play for my friends and family. I also have a YouTube channel where I post covers of songs.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play piano.
It's never too late to learn! I started playing when I was a kid.
I might have to look into taking lessons.
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks for the encouragement. What's your favorite thing to do on YouTube?
I love watching music videos and learning about new music. I also like watching comedy videos.
Same here! I love to laugh.
Me too! It's the best way to relieve stress.
I agree! So what do you do for work?
I'm currently unemployed, but I'm a writer and I have a YouTube channel.
That's cool! What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and poems. I also write reviews of books and movies.
Those are all great things to do!
Thanks
